A6.text: Demme won the Academy Award for The Silence of the Lambs (1991)â€”one of only three films to win all the major categories (Best Picture, Best Director, Best Screenplay, Best Actor, and Best Actress)

A7.text: His 1991 psychological horror film The Silence of the Lambs, based on the novel of the same title, won five Academy Awards, including Best Director and Best Picture
